description:
time: add default location parameter to time.Parse

If time.Parse isn't intended to parse only well defined timestamps
from network protocols or file formats, it should accept additional
parameter: location for which a time need to be generated.

See: http://groups.google.com/group/golang-nuts/browse_thread/thread/99cd159a135a8e7d

messages.text:
No. We are not changing the signature of time.Parse at this time.

-rob

Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com,

I'd like you to review this change to
https://go.googlecode.com/hg/

subject: code review 5565043: time: add default location parameter to time.Parse
